languages.text: "Да..." {n}Женщина медлит, закусывая губу.{/n} "Никто такого не ожидал. Господин Кастелья — человек благородных кровей, из губернаторского рода, вассал Винтерскейлов! И вдруг он заявил, что Райкади Филия теперь — его личные владения, заключенные — его подданные, подчиняться он никому не будет... ересь как есть!"

"Yes..." {n}She bites her lip.{/n} "No one expected this. Master Casteglia is a nobleman from a respected governor house and a vassal to House Winterscale! All of a sudden, he proclaimed that Rykadi Philia was now his personal domain, that the prisoners were his subjects, and that he would never bow to anyone again... It's pure heresy!"
languages.original_text: "Да..." {n}Женщина медлит, закусывая губу.{/n} "Никто такого не ожидал. Господин Кастелья — человек благородных кровей, из губернаторского рода, вассал Винтерскейлов! И вдруг он заявил, что Райкади Филия теперь — его личные владения, заключенные — его подданные, подчиняться он никому не будет... ересь как есть!"

All of a sudden, he proclaimed that Rykadi Philia was now his personal domain, the prisoners were his subjects, and that he would never bow to anyone again... It's pure heresy!"

All of a sudden, he proclaimed that Rykadi Philia was now his personal domain, that the prisoners were his subjects, and that he would never bow to anyone again... It's pure heresy!"

"Yes..." {n}She bites her lip.{/n} "No one expected this. Master Casteglia is a nobleman from a respected governor house and a vassal to House Winterscale! All of a sudden, he proclaimed that Rykadi Philia was now his personal domain, that the prisoners were his subjects, and that he would never bow to anyone again... It's pure heresy!"

languages.text: «Sí...». {n}Se muerde el labio.{/n} «Nadie se lo esperaba. ¡El maestro Casteglia es un noble de una respetada casa de gobernantes y un vasallo de la casa Winterscale! De un día para otro, anunció que Rykadi Philia era ahora su dominio personal, que los prisioneros eran sus súbditos y que nunca más se postraría ante nadie... Vamos, ¡una herejía en toda regla!».
languages.original_text: "Yes..." {n}She bites her lip.{/n} "No one expected this. Master Casteglia is a nobleman from a respected governor house and a vassal to House Winterscale! All of a sudden, he proclaimed that Rykadi Philia was now his personal domain, that the prisoners were his subjects, and that he would never bow to anyone again... It's pure heresy!"

traits.locale_text: «Sí...». {n}Se muerde el labio.{/n} «Nadie se lo esperaba. ¡El maestro Casteglia es un noble de una respetada casa de gobernantes y un vasallo de la casa Winterscale! De un día para otro, anunció que Rykadi Philia era ahora su dominio personal, que los prisioneros eran sus súbditos y que nunca más se postraría ante nadie... Vamos, ¡una herejía en toda regla!».

languages.text: "Ja ..." {n}Sie beißt sich auf die Lippe.{/n} "Niemand hat das vorhergesehen. Meister Casteglia ist ein Adeliger aus einem angesehenen Gouverneurshaus und ein Vasall des Hauses Winterzunder! Plötzlich hat er verkündet, dass Rykadi Philia sein persönliches Reich sei, die Gefangenen seine Untertanen, und dass er nie wieder vor irgendjemandem auf die Knie gehen würde ... Es ist die pure Ketzerei!"
languages.original_text: "Yes..." {n}She bites her lip.{/n} "No one expected this. Master Casteglia is a nobleman from a respected governor house and a vassal to House Winterscale! All of a sudden, he proclaimed that Rykadi Philia was now his personal domain, that the prisoners were his subjects, and that he would never bow to anyone again... It's pure heresy!"

traits.locale_text: "Ja ..." {n}Sie beißt sich auf die Lippe.{/n} "Niemand hat das vorhergesehen. Meister Casteglia ist ein Adeliger aus einem angesehenen Gouverneurshaus und ein Vasall des Hauses Winterzunder! Plötzlich hat er verkündet, dass Rykadi Philia sein persönliches Reich sei, die Gefangenen seine Untertanen, und dass er nie wieder vor irgendjemandem auf die Knie gehen würde ... Es ist die pure Ketzerei!"

languages.text: « Oui... {n}Elle se mord la lèvre.{/n} C'est une sacrée surprise. Maître Casteglia est un noble issu d'une maison de gouverneurs fort respectée, mais aussi un vassal de la maison Winterscale ! Et du jour au lendemain, il déclare que Rykadi Philia est désormais son domaine personnel, que les prisonniers sont ses sujets et qu'il ne se mettra plus jamais à genoux devant personne... C'est de l'hérésie ! »
languages.original_text: "Yes..." {n}She bites her lip.{/n} "No one expected this. Master Casteglia is a nobleman from a respected governor house and a vassal to House Winterscale! All of a sudden, he proclaimed that Rykadi Philia was now his personal domain, that the prisoners were his subjects, and that he would never bow to anyone again... It's pure heresy!"

traits.locale_text: « Oui... {n}Elle se mord la lèvre.{/n} C'est une sacrée surprise. Maître Casteglia est un noble issu d'une maison de gouverneurs fort respectée, mais aussi un vassal de la maison Winterscale ! Et du jour au lendemain, il déclare que Rykadi Philia est désormais son domaine personnel, que les prisonniers sont ses sujets et qu'il ne se mettra plus jamais à genoux devant personne... C'est de l'hérésie ! »

languages.text: “是的……”{n}她咬着嘴唇。{/n}“谁都没想到会发生这种事情。卡斯特格利亚大人是位贵族，来自备受尊敬的总督家族，也是温特斯凯尔家族的封臣！他突然宣称，莱卡德菲利亚星如今是他的私人领地，那些囚犯都是他的臣民，说他再也不会对任何人俯首称臣……真是异端行径！”
languages.original_text: "Yes..." {n}She bites her lip.{/n} "No one expected this. Master Casteglia is a nobleman from a respected governor house and a vassal to House Winterscale! All of a sudden, he proclaimed that Rykadi Philia was now his personal domain, that the prisoners were his subjects, and that he would never bow to anyone again... It's pure heresy!"

traits.locale_text: “是的……”{n}她咬着嘴唇。{/n}“谁都没想到会发生这种事情。卡斯特格利亚大人是位贵族，来自备受尊敬的总督家族，也是温特斯凯尔家族的封臣！他突然宣称，莱卡德菲利亚星如今是他的私人领地，那些囚犯都是他的臣民，说他再也不会对任何人俯首称臣……真是异端行径！”

languages.text: 「はい…」{n}彼女は唇を噛んだ。{/n}「誰もこんなことは予想していませんでした。カスティーリア殿は、尊敬される総督の家系の貴族であり、ウィンタースケール家の家臣です！彼は突然、ライカディ・フィリアは自分の領地であり、囚人は自分の臣下であり、二度と誰にも屈しないと宣言しました…まったくの異端です！」
languages.original_text: "Yes..." {n}She bites her lip.{/n} "No one expected this. Master Casteglia is a nobleman from a respected governor house and a vassal to House Winterscale! All of a sudden, he proclaimed that Rykadi Philia was now his personal domain, that the prisoners were his subjects, and that he would never bow to anyone again... It's pure heresy!"

traits.locale_text: 「はい…」{n}彼女は唇を噛んだ。{/n}「誰も予測できない事態です。カスティーリア様は尊敬される総督一族出身の貴族で、ウィンタースケール家の家臣なのです！いきなり、ライカディ・フィリアはあの方個人の領土で、捕虜は自分の家臣だと宣言されました。もう二度と誰にも跪かないと言い切って…これは紛うことなき異端です！」
「はい…」{n}彼女は唇を噛んだ。{/n}「誰もこんなことは予想していませんでした。カスティーリア殿は、尊敬される総督の家系の貴族であり、ウィンタースケール家の家臣です！彼は突然、ライカディ・フィリアは自分の領地であり、囚人は自分の臣下であり、二度と誰にも屈しないと宣言しました…まったくの異端です！」

languages.text: "Evet..." {n}Dudağını ısırıyor.{/n} "Kimse beklemiyordu. Üstat Casteglia, saygın bir vali hanesi soylusu ve Winterscale Hanesi kuludur! Durduk yere Rykadi Philia'nın artık kendi mülkü olduğunu, mahkûmları tebaası yaptığını ve bundan böyle kimseye boyun eğmeyeceğini beyan etti. Safi kâfirlik!"
languages.original_text: "Yes..." {n}She bites her lip.{/n} "No one expected this. Master Casteglia is a nobleman from a respected governor house and a vassal to House Winterscale! All of a sudden, he proclaimed that Rykadi Philia was now his personal domain, that the prisoners were his subjects, and that he would never bow to anyone again... It's pure heresy!"

traits.locale_text: "Evet..." {n}Dudağını ısırıyor.{/n} "Kimse beklemiyordu. Üstat Casteglia, saygın bir vali hanesi soylusu ve Winterscale Hanesi kuludur! Durduk yere Rykadi Philia'nın artık kendi mülkü olduğunu, mahkûmları tebaası yaptığını ve bundan böyle kimseye boyun eğmeyeceğini beyan etti. Safi kâfirlik!"
